name: example
title: Experiment on 90 Degree Constellation
excerpt: LaTeX is a typesetting system commonly used for scientific documents. This sample demonstrates a simple workflow where the raw .tex file is fetched by the browser and converted to HTML using a JS LaTeX renderer.

name: sample
title: Sample Article for Web Preview
excerpt: This is a sample LaTeX document intended to test client-side conversion to HTML using latex.js. It includes a title, sections, and some simple text. Math like E = mc2 is inline and should be handled.
